title: Classiq QSVT
subtitle: Classiq code for QSVT example
description: This notebook generates the QSVT (Quantum Singular Value Transform) example using Classiq, as in the Classiq framework paper. It builds a QSVT circuit with configurable size, degree, and phases under width and optimization constraints, and can be compared with Qiskit, TKet, and PennyLane-Catalyst implementations.
